text:
why do I feel like this blog started with "it's not what you think it is" then it is exactly what one may think.... i.e: pointer-like deference behavior's niceness sake

the blog says it's not that but the BCPL's 0-index is basically designed for that reason no?

elements.text:
why do I feel like this blog started with "it's not what you think it is" then it is exactly what one may think.... i.e: pointer-like deference behavior's niceness sake

the blog says it's not that but the BCPL's 0-index is basically designed for that reason no?

text: Yesish. He makes the point that unlike what people usual talk about there it was to save compile time not run time

elements.text: Yesish. He makes the point that unlike what people usual talk about there it was to save compile time not run time

text: I personally just enjoy the added color of the story and the fact that it’s not so cut and dried as “this is better”

elements.text: I personally just enjoy the added color of the story and the fact that it’s not so cut and dried as “this is better”
